description: First floor partial rear extension; external alterations to side roof extension involving retiling, replacement of existing window and installation of additional window
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings: MHR/001; MHR/002; MHR/003; MHR/004; MHR/005; MHR/006; MHR/500; and MHR/501.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Any upper-flow window to be located in a wall forming a side elevation of the building must be obscure-glazed and non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7m above the floor of the room in which the window is installed.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | No part of any roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
